Metadata.description: I am Petr Hovorka, a frontend developer specializing in modern web technologies and web application development. I create user-friendly and responsive websites for a great user experience.
Metadata.title: Petr Hovorka | Websites and Apps

ProjectsPage.title: Projects

projects.atrea: Internal company application simplifying data entry and retrieval across all departments of Atrea.
projects.github-finder: A web application for searching users on GitHub. It displays user details and statistics.
projects.integromat-careers: Career portal for Integromat. Job offers and presentation of the team and culture.
projects.integromat-help: Knowledge base for Integromat users. Documentation, guides and tips.
projects.mjd: Implementation of a company catalog with search and filtering for the online version of the magazine M≈Øj d≈Øm krok za krokem.
projects.movie-finder: A web application for searching for movies. It displays basic information about the movie with an attached trailer.
projects.photovoltaics: Implementation of a calculator for calculating savings when installing photovoltaics. With detailed calculations and visualization.
projects.sticky-notes: A simple application for creating and managing notes under a user account.
projects.weather-app: A simple web application for displaying current weather conditions, with a forecast for the following days.
